title: New Features on Flash Token Bar
content:
Version 1.18.x:

  • Transformations! The new Transformation icon (frog) allows you to polymorph tokens into creatures.
  • Monk's Active Tiles integration If you have the module installed you'll see Flash Token Bar actions available, or use a macro with 'Run Macro' if you prefer.
  • Added setting to lock position of menu when lock is active

Version 1.17.x:

  • Teleport and Place Tokens Teleport icon allows you to quickly grab a group of tokens and place in new location or scene; Place Tokens icon creates duplicates of the selected actors

1.16.x and 1.15.x:

  • Added libwrapper support and result concealment on individual blind/private rolls in group rolls

If you like this module, consider supporting me on Patreon.

Join the discussion on Discord or visit the Github repository.
